title: STSPR Package Configuration
description: Package-level configuration for the STSPR (sync-ts-project-refs) tool.

exclude.description: When true, exclude this package from processing (it will not be updated and dependents will not reference it).

path.description: Canonical tsconfig for this package (the file other packages should reference). Relative to the package root.

includeSiblings.description: Whether the canonical tsconfig should reference sibling tsconfig.*.json files (discovery for tsserver/eslint project service).

standardReferencesCanonical.description: Whether the standard tsconfig.json should reference the canonical tsconfig (discovery). Defaults to true when canonicalTsconfig.path != ./tsconfig.json, otherwise false.

includeWorkspaceDeps.description: Whether the canonical tsconfig should include workspace dependency references.

references.description: References that apply only to the canonical tsconfig file.

path.description: Path to a referenced tsconfig (relative to the package root).
Reference path to skip/remove (relative to the canonical tsconfig directory).
